Class Sale Line¶

class src.entities.base.SaleLine.SaleLine(uds, art)[source]¶

Sale line class This class is responsible of modeling the sale lines of a given sale.

Init method Initializes an instance of SaleLine class given the following parameters

Parameters:
  • uds – Number of units
  • art – Article object

An instance of SaleLine class
